TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
It is just something we do on a regular basis through the year. It is a nice table.

Customer: Did the other customer drink my soup or did the other customer get drunk?

Customer: A new page please, with plenty of gravy.

Edited March 8, 2022 by ColdJ

Sorry, but I can't answer two questions. 

Why'd Jeb has radioactive materials?

Waiter: Sorry, but you want the thread across the road.

Customer: Why is that customer face down in my soup?

Because he is a face plant. See? He has leaves!

C: Waiter, what is 42?

The meaning of life and is also February 11.

Waiter! I want a Valentine.
Sorry, but consuming Kerbals are not allowed in this diner. Have some sandwich.

Plutonium Sandwich? Ok

waiter, there is some explosive in my soup
Waiter There's a soup in my soup in my soup in my soup in my soup in my soup in my soup in my soup in my soup in my soup.

Here's hot water to avert it.

Waiter! Can you wait?

Sure! (I wait 100, 000 years)

Waiter! Why's my soup radioactive again! I want another diner please!

Because you ordered the Neptunium soup!

Waiter! I want some puos in my soup!

You get the pi. Not a pie, but a pi to solve my son's homework.

Waiter! Why is there a manuscript on my soup?

It's a menu. Should I bring another plate, or you keep playing with food?

Waiter! I asked for the lego soup, not for the plastic alphabet one.

Edited March 11, 2022 by kerbiloid

Waiter: Sorry but the Chef is having trouble reading the instructions to put it together.

Customer: Waiter there is a forum member floating in my soup.

Wrong soup. DAMN YOU, MARK! 

Waiter! There's a hot fork on my soup, and also, my soup is green.

It's a Kerbal soup! You eat Jeb!

Waiter! Why's my soup radioactive again?

Waiter: because you keep putting your finger in it. You are radioactive from eating uranium cereal.

Customer: A lead bowl of soup please.

Sorry, we have only led ones left.

Waiter! Is the bus stop at your diner USB-compatible?

Sorry, but you want the "Ask for stupid soup, get a stupid Waiter" thread.

Customer: Is this a knife I see before me, in my soup?

Oh, so that's where our knife went, sorry sir! No refunds.

Waiter! Why is there ice on my soup?!

It's your ice cream soup. 

Waiter! Why there's a Spy sapping my soup?

Do you even have a Pyro on your Team? No? well...

Waiter! There are Combines on my soup!

Yes. It's a compound feedstuff. Spit this out and leave the barn, please.

Waiter! Do you really have only sandwiches? Where are the claywiches or mudwiches?

But this is an desert restaurant!

Waiter! This soup is not in the correct timeline, throw it away please!

Why so? People never get soup, so you're lucky.

Waiter! Why is my soup sticky?
